target.name: build-ci
target.description: Builds the project for the continuous integration server

target.name: phpunit
target.description: Run only unit tests with PHPUnit

target.name: phpcs-ci
target.description: Find coding standard violations in PHP source using PHP_CodeSniffer creating a log file for the continuous integration server

target.name: build-ci-minimal
target.description: Builds the project for the continuous integration server

target.name: behat-advanced
target.description: Run behat test with advaned filter

target.name: phpunit-coverage
target.description: Run unit tests code coverage analize with PHPUnit

target.name: symfony-twig-lint
target.description: Lints a template and outputs encountered errors for all templates

target.name: chown-cache
target.description: Make jenkins owner of cache to cleanup

target.name: make-project-master
target.description: Merge project develop branche to master

exec.command: git checkout master;git pull --rebase origin master;git pull --rebase origin develop;git push origin master

target.name: make-core-master
target.description: Merge core develop branche to master

exec.command: cd ${project.dir-src};git checkout master;git pull --rebase origin master;git merge develop;git push origin master

target.name: symfony-doctrine-fixtures-load-test
target.description: Loads Doctrine data fixtures to the database
